main event: A whitish light was observed moving in a NE or NE direction, believed to be a craft that landed 10 miles after sighting.
interesting points: The object was described as a whitish light.
The object changed direction from NE to NE and then faded from sight.
The object was believed to be a 'c/c' (craft) that landed 10 miles after the sighting.
The sighting occurred on July 13, 1958 in St. Louis, Missouri.
The report indicates that photographs were taken of the sighting.
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
